hero.title: What if flying private was as accessible as a commercial ticket?
hero.subtitle: Book empty-leg private jet flights between Colombia, Mexico, and the Americas at up to 95% off regular charter prices. Luxury travel made accessible across Latin America.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Booking your dream flight is easier than ever. Follow these simple steps to access luxury travel at unbeatable prices.

step1.title: Search & Compare
step1.description: Browse available empty-leg flights, compare prices, aircraft types, and departure times to find your perfect match.

step2.title: Book Instantly
step2.description: Secure your seat with our streamlined booking process. Add passengers, select services, and complete payment in minutes.

step3.title: Fly in Luxury
step3.description: Arrive at the private terminal, skip the crowds, and enjoy your premium travel experience with personalized service.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose ChanceFly
whyChoose.subtitle: Experience the difference with our premium platform designed for discerning travelers.

savings.title: Massive Savings
savings.description: Save up to 75% on luxury private flights by booking empty-leg routes from verified operators.

quality.title: Verified Quality
quality.description: All aircraft and operators are thoroughly vetted for safety, luxury standards, and service excellence.

instant.title: Instant Booking
instant.description: Book confirmed flights instantly with our streamlined platform. No waiting, no uncertainty.

advantages.noQueuesSub: Skip the crowds and long security lines
advantages.flexibilitySub: Change your plans with minimal restrictions
advantages.privacySub: Enjoy your flight without any disturbances

testimonials.title: Don't just take our word for it
testimonials.subtitle: Hundreds of travelers already fly private with our empty leg deals.

customer1.text: Found ChanceFly through a family member and it's been great for business trips. Good pricing and reliable service. I've used it several times now without any issues.
customer1.name: Carolina Vargas

customer2.text: Nice alternative to commercial flights when I need something more comfortable. The empty-leg options work well for my schedule most of the time.
customer2.name: Andrés Morales

customer3.text: Easy to use website and helpful customer service when I had questions. Definitely saves money compared to regular charter prices.
customer3.name: Isabella Ramírez

cta.title: Ready to Experience Luxury Travel?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of smart travelers who've discovered the ChanceFly advantage. Your next luxury flight is just a click away.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Exclusive Deals
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about new empty-leg flights and special offers.

company.description: Your gateway to luxury travel at accessible prices. Discover empty-leg flights and experience premium aviation.

hero.title: Redefining Luxury Travel
hero.subtitle: ChanceFly is revolutionizing private aviation by making luxury travel accessible, transparent, and effortless. Discover our story and the passion that drives us forward.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To democratize luxury travel and create a world where exceptional experiences are within everyone's reach.

breaking.title: Breaking Down Barriers
breaking.description1: Private aviation has long been reserved for the ultra-wealthy. We believe this shouldn't be the case. By connecting travelers with empty leg flights and exclusive deals, we're making luxury travel accessible to more people than ever before.
breaking.description2: Our technology-driven approach eliminates inefficiencies, reduces costs, and creates win-win scenarios for both travelers and operators.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do and shape the future of luxury travel.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Every decision we make prioritizes our customers' needs, comfort, and satisfaction above all else.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge technology to solve complex problems and create seamless experiences.

trustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
trustSafety.description: We maintain the highest standards of safety, security, and transparency in everything we do.

team.title: Built by Aviation Enthusiasts
team.subtitle: Our team combines decades of aviation industry experience with cutting-edge technology expertise. We're passionate about making luxury travel accessible to everyone while maintaining the highest standards of service and safety.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a traveler seeking your next adventure, an operator looking to grow your business, or simply someone who shares our passion for aviation, we invite you to be part of the ChanceFly story.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions about ChanceFly? Need support with your booking? Want to partner with us? We're here to help and would love to hear from you.

options.title: How Can We Help?
options.subtitle: Choose the best way to reach our team based on your needs.

call.title: Call Us
call.description: Speak directly with our booking specialists

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.subject: Subject

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about ChanceFly and our services.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: For the best availability and rates, we recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance. However, we can often accommodate last-minute requests depending on aircraft availability.

pricing.question: What's included in the flight price?
pricing.answer: Our prices include the aircraft, crew, fuel, and standard catering. Additional services like ground transportation, special catering requests, or overnight fees may apply.

cancellation.question: What happens if my flight is cancelled?
cancellation.answer: In the rare event of a cancellation, we'll work immediately to find you an alternative flight or provide a full refund. Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

pets.question: Can I bring pets on my flight?
pets.answer: Yes! One of the benefits of private aviation is that pets are welcome. Just let us know when booking so we can ensure the aircraft is properly prepared.

hero.title: Partner with ChanceFly
hero.subtitle: Join the premier platform for luxury aviation. Connect with high-value travelers, maximize your fleet utilization, and grow your business with ChanceFly's innovative marketplace.

benefits.title: Why Partner with Us?
benefits.subtitle: Join a growing network of premium operators and unlock new revenue opportunities.

revenue.title: Increased Revenue
revenue.description: Monetize empty leg flights and fill vacant seats with our extensive customer network.

clientele.title: Premium Clientele
clientele.description: Access to vetted, high-net-worth individuals who value luxury and reliability.

operations.title: Simplified Operations
operations.description: Streamlined booking process with automated payments and customer management.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Join our network in four simple steps and start maximizing your aircraft's potential.

apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Submit your aircraft details and operator credentials for review.

verify.title: Verify
verify.description: Complete our comprehensive vetting process for safety and quality.

list.title: List
list.description: Your aircraft goes live on our premium marketplace platform.

earn.title: Earn
earn.description: Start receiving high-value bookings from verified clients.

cta.title: Ready to Maximize Your Fleet?
cta.subtitle: Join our exclusive network of premium operators and start generating higher returns from your aircraft investments.
cta.cardSubtitle: Complete our simple application process and join ChanceFly's network of elite aviation partners.
